Descrição Detalhada

Recupera os dados do usuário logado, retornando-os para a camada de negócio.

402  def fetch(self, username, database):
403 
404  try:
405  uid = database.objects.get(field='NAME',value=username)
406  uid = uid.identity
407 
408  sf = lambda x: self.__select_field(uid, x, database)
409 
410  fetchset = [
411  ('password', sf('PASSWORD')),
412  ('matric', sf('MATRIC')),
413  ('bios', sf('BIOS')),
414  ('campus', sf('CAMPUS')),
415  ('avatar', sf('AVATAR')),
416  ('email', sf('EMAIL')),
417  ('sex', sf('SEX')),
418  ('language', sf('LANGUAGE')),
419  ]
420 
421  sfc = sf('COURSE') # select field courses
422 
423  if database is Student:
424  fetchset = fetchset + [
425  ('grades', sf('GRADE')),
426  ('interests', sf('INTEREST'))
427  ]
428 
429  lc = [] # List of courses
430 
431  for c in sfc:
432  # Select Field for Modules Completed
433  sfmc = sf('MODULE_COMPLETED')
434  # Modules contidos neste Course
435  mods = map(lambda x: x.value,
436  Courses.objects.filter(identity=c,
437  field='MODULE'))
438 
439  # Modules Completed for this Course
440  mcftc = []
441 
442  for mc in sfmc:
443  if mc in mods:
444  mcftc = mcftc + [mc]
445 
446  # Get number of modules completed
447  mcftc = len(mcftc)
448  # Get number of modules in this course
449  nmod = len(mods)
450 
451  cname = Courses.objects.get(identity=c, field='NAME').value
452  lc = lc + [{'name':cname,
453  'id':c,
454  'completion': mcftc*100/nmod}]
455 
456  sfc = lc
457 
458  fetchset = fetchset + [('courses', sfc)]
459 
460  except database.DoesNotExist as exc:
461  fetchset = []
462 
463  return fetchset

465  def fetchField(self, field):
466 
467  ret = []
468 
469  try:
470  lstu = Student.objects.filter(field=field) #list of students
471  lpro = Professor.objects.filter(field=field) #list of professors
472 
473  except Student.DoesNotExist:
474  lstu = []
475  except Professor.DoesNotExist:
476  lpro = []
477 
478  for s in lstu:
479  ret.append(s.value)
480 
481  for p in lpro:
482  ret.append(p.value)
483 
484  return ret

Definição na linha 485 do arquivo ProfileUnit.py.

485 
486  def update(self, username, field, newdata, database):
487 
488  try:
489  uid = database.objects.get(field='NAME', value=username)
490  uid = uid.identity
491 
492  ## Para o caso de COURSEs, GRADEs ou INTERESTs.
493  if field[-1] == 's':
494  if field[-2] == 'e' or field[-2] == 't':
495  field = field[:-1]
496 
497  try:
498  data = database.objects.get(field=field.upper(), identity=uid)
499  data.value = newdata
500  except database.DoesNotExist:
501  data = database(identity=uid, field=field.upper(), value=newdata)
502  data.save()
503 
504  except ( database.DoesNotExist,
505  database.MultipleObjectsReturned ) as exc:
506  raise ValueError(exc)
